execution_plan.description: Retrieve shipped order items and their shipment tracking numbers from the shipments database (maps order_item_id -> shipment_tracking_number).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT si.order_item_id, s.shipment_tracking_number FROM shipment_items si JOIN shipments s ON si.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE s.shipment_tracking_number IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Get the status codes for the order items identified in step 1 from the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, order_item_status_code FROM Order_Items WHERE order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);
